description: Energy efficiency metrics (SEER/COP) in both IP (Btu/Wh) and SI (W/W) conventions

btu_per_wh.name: Btu per Watt-hour
btu_per_wh.description: Energy ratio commonly used in IP units

w_per_w.name: Watt per Watt
w_per_w.description: Dimensionless efficiency in SI units (watts out per watt in)

seer_ip.name: SEER (IP)
seer_ip.description: Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio (US/IP) measured in Btu/Wh

cop_ip.name: COP (IP)
cop_ip.description: Coefficient of Performance (IP) measured in Btu/Wh equivalent

seer_si.name: SEER (SI)
seer_si.description: Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio (SI) measured in W/W

cop_si.name: COP (SI)
cop_si.description: Coefficient of Performance (SI) measured in W/W
